author: pipermerriam
content:
How do people feel about going ahead and getting an EIP written up to include an access list in the block header?

- Makes the `wit/XXXX` protocol able to be upgraded such that it is "provable"
- Sets us up to be able to better experiment with witnesses.
- I think clients are already tracking this information with hot/cold storage slots and account access.

If so, we'd be looking for someone to author and advocate for the EIP.  I'd be happy to work with that person on specifying and editing.  This would be a great opportunity to write your first EIP if you've been interested in getting deeper into the protocol.
